description: An array of gadgets will track your fitness program, tell you in great detail how many calories you're burning, and what your heart rate is. They can even give you a kick when you are falling short of your goals.
contentencoded:
An array of gadgets will track your fitness program, tell you in great detail how many calories you're burning, and what your heart rate is. They can even give you a kick when you are falling short of your goals.

CNET executive editor Molly Wood, who has tried just about all of them, joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison to share her recommendations.
